attributes.background: Every  still born baby  and the parents of still borns  should be able to say goodbye and have a propped send off weather the baby is born before 24 weeks they are still human someones child

rejection.details:
It's clear that you would like parents to be able to say goodbye properly when they lose a child. We're not clear what action you would like the Government or Parliament take. Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

If you think that issuing birth certificates for all stillborn babies would help, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/177442

If you would like the Government or Parliament to do something else, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like them to do.
